p: Different integrated care models were identified. All studies assessed integrated care in multidisciplinary teams or collaborative care teams. Three studies evaluated various psychosocial interventions integrated with treatment of an infectious disease in an OAT program delivery by DOT [ 13, 31, 32]. Seven studies evaluated the efficacy of brief psychological interventions, regular telephone calls, or social and mental health services in collaboration with other health professionals [ 14, 15, 26, 28â€“ 30, 33].
